body: So this is kind of a Sug/Question thingy, but is it possible to keep the nexus rot continually changing.  Because on the rare occasion that there are enough players to start a Nexus game, we are always playing on the same map Dredmor and on the rarest occasion Travincal 1 ( it requires 4 players and most leave after the first game ).  This way we can play on the other maps Nexus has to offer.
body_tagged: So this is kind of a Sug/Question thingy, but is it possible to keep the nexus rot continually changing.  Because on the rare occasion that there are enough players to start a Nexus game, we are always playing on the same map Dredmor and on the rarest occasion Travincal 1 ( it requires 4 players and most leave after the first game ).  This way we can play on the other maps Nexus has to offer.
title: Nexus rots

replies.body:
Usually staff doesn't hear suggestions on forums. There already is almost the same sug. And nothing was done.
But now you can directly ask them in "Ask the Seniors" folder ;>
+1 of course

replies.body: nexus has been offline for so long

replies.body: Currently, Randomized rotations are impossible. What I can do is organize the maps from low player count to large player count (like throwback).
replies.body_tagged: Currently, Randomized rotations are impossible. What I can do is organize the maps from low player count to large player count (like throwback).

replies.body: maybe bring the server online for a start
replies.body_tagged: maybe bring the server online for a start

replies.body: That would be great.  Just would like to play different maps whenever we do get a game going.
